description:
Bad Bird found a document which says that gold is hidden beneath the Little Tokyo castle. With the help of Ninja Crows he manages to hijack the train with the Lucille being one of the passengers. They are ordered to dig to find the gold.  Meanwhile, Pizza Cats realized that Lucille hasn`t returned home yet. Speedy suggests that she is aboard that hijacked train. Pizza Cats go to the tunnel to find her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ホレホレ穴掘れもっと掘れ!
